name: home (itch) (Brenden Gibbons Makes Stuff)
description:
home was created for Ludum Dare #29 (April 2014) with the theme "Beneath the Surface". This was originally uploaded through google drive and now resides here as a playable archive.

You are the spirit of a home and yesterday, a child that you had meant to protect was taken away from you, from the family that you have taken care of for so many generations.

Side note: video may not load properly. Unfortunately, it was made in the old twine 1 and I've lost the raw files. However, the video is available here and is embedded below. Whilst it's not the perfect way to experience the game, it's still available to be played.
